snippet: Miguel Cabrera pleaded no contest to drunken driving after an incident in Fort Pierce, Fla.; two charges were dropped.
lead_paragraph: Miguel Cabrera pleaded no contest to drunken driving after an incident in Fort Pierce, Fla.; two charges were dropped.

headline.seo: Cabrera Receives Probation in D.U.I. Case
